query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.GND = 'B' THEN A.CNT ELSE 0 END) CTQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.GND = 'D' THEN A.CNT ELSE 0 END) RTQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.GND NOT IN ('D', 'B') THEN A.CNT ELSE 0 END) MTQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.CNT > 0 THEN A.CNT ELSE 0 END) TTQ FROM (
SELECT A.BSU_ARA ARA, A.LGORT BSU, VALUE(C.GND,B.GND) GND, ( SUM(VALUE(C.CNT02,0)) - SUM(VALUE(B.CNT02,0))) CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, BSU_ARA ,VKGRP, LGORT , 'A' GND FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
UNION ALL
SELECT MANDT, BSU_ARA ,VKGRP, LGORT , 'B' GND FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
UNION ALL
SELECT MANDT, BSU_ARA ,VKGRP, LGORT , 'C' GND FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
UNION ALL
SELECT MANDT, BSU_ARA ,VKGRP, LGORT , 'D' GND FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
UNION ALL
SELECT MANDT, BSU_ARA ,VKGRP, LGORT , 'Z' GND FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CS157_GHB ,A.CS157_CHB ,A.CS157_GND GND ,COUNT(*) CNT02 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST157 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS157_UPN = B.CS126_UPN AND A.CS157_CST = B.CS126_CST AND A.CS157_PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.CS157_HNO = B.CS126_HNO AND A.CS157_SEQ = B.CS126_SEQ AND A.CS157_GND = B.CS126_GND
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS157_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS157_HNO = C.HNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(A.CS157_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND VALUE(B.CS126_SLA,'N') = 'N' AND A.CS157_FYN = '' AND A.CS157_IKD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE# AND C.EXC = '' GROUP BY A.CS157_GHB, A.CS157_CHB, A.CS157_GND ) B ON A.LGORT = B.CS157_CHB AND A.GND = B.GND LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CS157_GHA ,A.CS157_CHA ,A.CS157_GND GND ,COUNT(*) CNT02 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST157 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS157_UPN = B.CS126_UPN AND A.CS157_CST = B.CS126_CST AND A.CS157_PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.CS157_HNO = B.CS126_HNO AND A.CS157_SEQ = B.CS126_SEQ AND A.CS157_GND = B.CS126_GND
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS157_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS157_HNO = C.HNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(A.CS157_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND VALUE(B.CS126_SLA,'N') = 'N' AND A.CS157_FYN = '' AND A.CS157_IKD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE#,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE# AND C.EXC = '' GROUP BY A.CS157_GHA, A.CS157_CHA,A.CS157_GND ) C ON A.LGORT = C.CS157_CHA AND A.GND = C.GND WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LGORT > '' AND A.VKGRP > ''
GROUP BY A.BSU_ARA, A.LGORT, C.GND, B.GND ) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET CTQ = B.CTQ ,RTQ = B.RTQ ,MTQ = B.MTQ ,TTQ = B.TTQ
